meanings.definition: To alter the landscape of an area by redesigning or rearranging it.
meanings.sent1: The family relandscaped their backyard by adding a new garden.
meanings.sent2: The city council decided to relandscape the park to make it more appealing to visitors.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors were surprised when they saw the relandscaped yard with a giant gnome statue.
meanings.sent4: Her mind relandscaped the memories of her childhood into a beautiful garden of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush relandscaped the canvas into a vibrant masterpiece of colors.

meanings.definition: The act of redesigning or rearranging the landscape of an area.
meanings.sent1: The relandscaped garden looked stunning with its new flowers and pathways.
meanings.sent2: After the relandscape, the park became a popular spot for picnics.
meanings.sent3: The relandscaped area became the talk of the town with its unique features.
meanings.sent4: The relandscaped scenery resembled a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The relandscape project transformed the dull space into a vibrant oasis.
